pages.text: $(italic)You already noticed dealing significantly more damage to enemies if you jump while attacking.$(br)To further improve those jump attacks, you have developed this enhancement, which increases the additional damage even more.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Additional damage when dealing crits.$(br2)Max Level: 2$(br)Applicable to melee weapons.$(br)Mutually exclusive with Sharpness.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a common Book with Improved Critical by surrounding your Enchanter with Pigment and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading Improved Critical from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.$(br)This price will quickly increase to more and more Pigment and Experience for each additional level.
